thread.section_title: Voltaire Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Voltaire Diamonds | voltairediamonds.ie
thread.title: Bridget

author: Bridget
title: Bridget
text: We had a lovely experience in Voltaire Diamonds. From the minute Orla met us & showed us into the private room we felt relaxed and away from the noise of the shops etc outside. She answered any questions we had & we didn't feel pressured or rushed in any way. When she got an idea of what we were looking for she made sure to bring in the rings that suited our taste. We were delighted with our choice and it was ready a few days later. A great experience. Thanks Orla.
